description: An object that describes a single port.

appProtocol.description: The application protocol for this port. This field follows standard Kubernetes label syntax. Un-prefixed names are reserved for IANA standard service names (as per RFC-6335 and http://www.iana.org/assignments/service-names). Non-standard protocols should use prefixed names such as 'mycompany.com/my-custom-protocol'. This field can be enabled with `ServiceAppProtocol` feature gate.

name.description: The name of this port. This must match the `name` field in the corresponding Service port. Must be a valid DNS-1123 label. Optional only if one port is defined, otherwise it is required.

port.description: The port number of the endpoint.

protocol.description: The IP protocol for this port. Must be UDP, TCP, or SCTP. Default is TCP.
